text:
edit a page in bxe, click on "insert image".
in the popup, select an image resource, click "submit".
the image is inserted ok. what you don't see is that the usecase throws an npe.
i only realized that when i tried to rewrite the usecase and got rid of the
"window.close()" call during development.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18900
the full error message and stacktrace.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18901
a patch to demonstrate the error.

apply this patch to get rid of the "window.close()" calls, to see the error
message.
It should be fixed now, please try again.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: yes, works for me now. thanks,
creator: nettings@apache.org
